verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise the Savior, ye who know Him! newline Who can tell how much we owe Him? newline Gladly let us render to Him newline All we are and have.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus is the name that charms us, newline He for conflict fits and arms us; newline Nothing moves and nothing harms us newline While we trust in Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Trust in Him, ye saints, forever; newline He is faithful, changing never. newline Neither force nor guile can sever newline Those He loves from Him.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Keep us, Lord, newline O keep us cleaving to Thyself newline And still believing; newline 'Til the hour of our receiving, newline Promised joys with Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Then we shall be where we would be, newline Then we shall be what we should be; newline Things that are not now, nor could be, newline Soon shall be our own.
